import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { AppService } from 'src/app/services/app.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-student-header', templateUrl: './student-header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./student-header.component.scss'] }) export class StudentHeaderComponent implements OnInit { constructor(public appService: AppService) { } ngOnInit(): void { } }
